website_summaries.verdict: Plenty of dividers and pockets that allow you to organize your gear nicely at a low price.
pros: Includes 10 zippered pockets to sort golf equipment
cons: May be too tall to access clubs when bag is attached to golf carts with roofs

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bag. Lightweight, Durable. Some complained about lack of bottom handle however the lower part of the pocket on bottom has a hard point which acts as a handle. Zippers seem lightweight but we shall see. Love the full length club slots. I play a lot of golf so the bag will be tested well in the weeks to come.
customer_reviews.author: niblick

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in December, started sporadic use approximately March and used few times since then. The zipper on top side pocket (picture 1) broke and separated from bag within the first month of use. Pocket now open and not usable. Followed by the deteriation of fabric below the lift pocket (picture 2)on the bag bottom. Cannot use lift pocket without further damage to underlying fabric. Picture shows bag that looks new, but I've documented the lack of durability!! I hope to exchange or return this bag. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Art S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag with plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag with plenty of storage. The only thing I don't like about it is the putter slot seems a little deep for a 34 inch putter. My putter cover tends to fall off more. Well worth the price I paid though and just as good as the more expensive bags.
customer_reviews.author: E. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for the price. I'm hard on golf bags be they low price or high price. This one makes the most sense to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Hot-Z is the best ever
customer_reviews.text: Had several different bags,this one out shines them all.better then bags that I've seen for twice the price. Go with this one you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: mike smith

customer_reviews.title: It is too flimsy and won't stand up
customer_reviews.text: Update I have to say I'm disappointed with this bag. The deviders do seem to be separated all the way down, however the shell is very flimsy and the bag constantly falls over and already ruined my driver. It was fairly new and now dented. It is too flimsy and won't stand up. It just falls over no matter how flat the surface is
customer_reviews.author: Cruzer1200

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets & sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets and places to separate all of my golf accessories. I especially like the cold pocket. I really like that each club has its own area for ease of use as well as keeping them from jumbling all over the place! For a cart bag, its interesting that the towel hook is in the back when on the cart but overall its a wonderful upgrade from my old golf bag!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Lake

customer_reviews.title: Bag can handle light usage, not robust for a frequent golfer!
customer_reviews.text: Good for a year and half. Throwing it away because most of the individual club slots are all ripped up and now it is hard to get clubs out/in! Junk, I guess you get what you pay for. Contacted seller who leaned on the mfg. warranty, no coupon help, nothing! This bag is in the TRASH! Shopping elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Love this golf bag
customer_reviews.text: I wanted full length club dividers and this one is perfect! No more shuffling the clubs around to get a club in or out. I like the two handled aspect to put the bag on or off the cart. The pockets are great, different than what I was used to, but there are enough you can have almost everything you need and more with you on the course. As far as durability, I've only had it for a short while, but I can't imagine why it won't last!
customer_reviews.author: TexasGal

customer_reviews.title: Design could be improved
customer_reviews.text: The bag is pretty much as advertised, light weight, lots of pockets, reasonable quality of construction. My only complaint is the location of the grab handle. It's not located where you can use it to strap the bag onto a cart. That seems really odd for a bag that is not really optimized to be carried. I have yet to figure out a good way to strap it onto the cart. It will stay on but I have to cinch it down tightly to the point it can hamper replacing clubs into the outside compartments. Otherwise it's functional and I like it, just wish the design had been completed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela W

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was a nice golf bag,,,BUT
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this long but it seems to be a very good bag. I gave it a 4-star for durability, but I really don't know how durable it is because I've only had it. About a month. addition UPDATE: I have played many rounds since this purchase. I have downgraded my rating from a 4 star to 2 because although the cloth sleeves go all the way down, clubs constantly get hung up. I even put addtional plastic sleeves in and they still hang up. I'm leaving the rating at 2 stars because it seems to be holding up OK.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: All the pockets are convenient and zippers work well. It looks good, feels good and is holding up well. The only suggestion I would make is for the metal loop where I attach my towel to be on the side of the bag rather than above the handle since when I put the bag on a cart I have to hang the towel to one side or the other to access it. Not a big deal but a slight inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Ed W.

customer_reviews.title: pockets and price
customer_reviews.text: This golf bag on todays market far exceeds most bags hands down. There are more pockets then one can use, a perfect score card pocket, deep cooler pocket. Well I liked it so much I bought another one just like it. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: This bag with the putter pocket in the front is perfect. The cold pocket is nice
customer_reviews.text: I use a long putter. This bag with the putter pocket in the front is perfect. The cold pocket is nice. I have used it for several months and it is now worse for wear. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SvPhil

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but lining of pockets coming off after a few weeks use
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, potentially good with full length dividers but pocket lining not stitched properly and failing after a few uses. Light weight
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Burge

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Plenty of double zippered pockets. Very functional. Pleased with purchase. Would purchase from seller again. Extremely fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag!
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this bag. The only thing it's missing is a place to put your ball markers/divot pick! I got a small black pouch, glued some velcro to it, glued some velcro to the inside of the upper zippered pouch and it works great! I put my phone in the little slot on the left where it says its for score cards and it works great. Good Bag!
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: pretty good bag
customer_reviews.text: Good value and about what I expected. The missing star is because the fabric at the bottom of the pockets sometimes get pulled up along with the club, and so must be tamped down again when you return the club.
customer_reviews.author: lewet

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I think the price is misleading. This is one of the best deals I have gotten on a golf bag. It is everything advertised. I recently started walking more and this bag is great on my cart. I plan to get another one for my wife. Plenty of storage, light weight and durable. It seem a little odd but I really like the two handles that make lifting so easy, very designed for the golfer.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Zippers are Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks and layout of this bag. Unfortunately, the zippers are cheap and a couple of them keep getting stuck. I will likely return.
customer_reviews.author: aysrav

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight bag with tons of pockets and a 14 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight bag with tons of pockets and a 14 way full length divided top, including and external putter tube. Nice carry strap, with a slot to tuck it in when it's on a cart. It's got handles built into the top to move it around.
customer_reviews.author: Dadmc

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: Have had the bag since November and I have to replace it already. Bag is falling apart, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Suejer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag, very nice size and weight. From the picture I thought it might be too big, 14 dividers, only possible negative is how long it will last but at about 50% cost of other bags you could buy two, Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Garyggo

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these bags. Plenty of slots for my clubs and pockets for everything i need on the course. It fits well on a push cart or ride cart. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag...
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag about a month ago...love it...plenty of pockets..and it is light in weight...no problem with durability....I am very happy with this product...use it 2 or 3 times a week...
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this golf bag. It seems to have a place for all the stuff I carry with me on the course. The full length dividers keep the clubs from getting tangled. It should be durable but it is too soon to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great bag BUT the cooler pocket rips easy and becomes useless
customer_reviews.text: It’s even better then the photos. The bag is pretty bad ass. Made well, good sitching and strong zippers. I’ll update this review if things change once i have put and pulled out my clubs over the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: michael mark sayegh

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: Sloppy workmanship ... Even the logo’s on crooked. Plastic zippers. Plastic rings. How did this item get so many good reviews? Where’s the umbrella holder?
customer_reviews.author: GAP

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, lots of pockets, very light
customer_reviews.text: I just got the bag so I can't speak to how well it will hold up over time but I really like it. It has lots of appropriately sized pockets and it has the full sleeve for each club. It stands up well on its own, even with my extra long clubs. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Good value bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag has all the pockets you could need including a cool pocket which could hold 4 drink cans and a cool pack. Good separation of all clubs with large putter space. Fits well on the cart and stands OK alone.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Rock

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had the bag for long but so far I really like how lightweight it is and seems to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: tamara clark

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great price!
customer_reviews.text: My old bag din't have enough pockets for all my stuff. This one almost has too many but well made, attractive and fairly lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. George

customer_reviews.title: Golf bag with full length row dividers
customer_reviews.text: This golf bag is lightweight, even though it has full length row dividers and 9 separate pockets. Two easy carry handles also. The bag arrived two days before I expected it! Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: This is an OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok bag for the price. pockets are adequate and convenient. The club slots are not same size. The corner slots are very nerrow.
customer_reviews.author: thak

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves the Bag
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and has plenty of storage for golf accessories. He loves it and I am the hero!
customer_reviews.author: LCH

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: Bag came in all black, I had ordered black with cobalt blue. Too much trouble to return so I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: The Col.

customer_reviews.title: Best golf bag I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this golf bag! I would buy again! The only negative is there are no rings to clip your towel or cleaning brush.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking with ample pockets
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well-made golf bag with dividers for every club. There are plenty of pockets for all the items and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine E.

customer_reviews.title: Hubby likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for hubby. He likes it, but he mentioned that sometimes the clubs slide out when he puts it in the trunk. He attributes this to the fact that the base is wider than the top. Otherwise, he really likes all the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Cubby

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 12th bag and one of the best if not the best one I've bought. Only time will tell as durability is a huge marker for me. I love all the pockets and the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golf Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love my bag looks pockets and individual holder for clubs
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bag. Light. Separate club slots. Easy access. Plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: OysterJim

customer_reviews.title: Golf bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she likes it. What more can I say.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy it 👌
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even look any farther !! Just But it !! Amazing bag for the money !! So light you could carry this for 18 holes 🤓
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tee Time
customer_reviews.text: this is a well made bag, a value for the price. Plenty of storage pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The bag is quality, light weight, plenty of pockets for stowing gloves, shoes, balls, tees, even cold drinks in an insulated pocket. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: King George

customer_reviews.title: Great cart bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag has been great so far. Loads of storage and seems durable. We'll see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Clay A.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent Golf Bag. I like all the features that it has. Lots of pockets for whatever you feel you need at the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: PaPa John

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s braking down in the middle (twisting) guess you pay for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Almost didn't order it since an earlier review said that it wasn't good for larger grips. I use large Wynn grips and it works fine for me. A good quality bag for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Callon

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Cart Bag
customer_reviews.text: I can easily accommodate and organize my golf clubs. It’s very light for carrying all clubs. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: RAUL COLON

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money....
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag for the money. Separate club dividers are a good feature at this price. Only potential concern is the quality of all of the zippers. Will have to see if they hold up. Have had it for 5 weeks to date and very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He is very happy with it and I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lots of storage space all over
customer_reviews.text: Is a great bag. lots of space for everything I need. love the color and have had many complements on it. had to have it couldn't beat the price. haven't used it yet but with previous bags this one seems much better construction and weight.
customer_reviews.author: GyB

customer_reviews.title: nice look
customer_reviews.text: like that is my initial in the bag, i wish it had more clips to hold items
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Zuppichini

customer_reviews.title: This golf bag is exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing that struck me was how light this bag is, 4.5 lbs. I walk, and the bag is on my pushcart. All the pockets you need. Individual compartments for 14 clubs. Price you can't beat. I recommend this golf bag.
customer_reviews.author: dmac07

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what I wanted and is as good as u can hope for and priced very well
customer_reviews.author: FRANK J CARDASCIA

customer_reviews.title: Everything was good until I noticed there was no loop for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good until I noticed there was no loop for a golf cart strap to go through.I might have to return this because I ride a power cart.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye F

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great product for the price. If it lasts I'm happy! I bought a Top Flight bag 2 yrs back and zippers broke already so I saw this and I'm very pleased with all the pockets too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. The things I don't like are the very deep pockets and the pockets for scorecard and pencil. Those are a waist of production costs. Picky but; my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not enough lifting points and everything is on one side of the bag not on both but it works
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: golf bag
customer_reviews.text: Golf bag is great !!! Lots of storage and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for use with motorized golf carts ....... just ok for push carts!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for the money. Holds everything I would ever want to carry.
customer_reviews.author: DLP - Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Harley colors
customer_reviews.text: Missing some storage areas I would have thought would have been included
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Super value
customer_reviews.text: well made. Looks good and seems to be as good as bags that cost double the amount. Plenty of well placed pockets and it is light. This bag was recommended by friend who has one. I am thanking him every time we go play. Good choice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag. After looking at many bags well over $200, I found this one to be as good or better. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Now looking for the right weather to go out and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Its a bag that has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I love all the zippered areas on the bag including one to keep beverages cold.
customer_reviews.author: Matski

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my son. The bag is very light, so even though it is labelled a cart bag carrying it is an option. It has plenty of pockets, plus an outside system for carrying an umbrella. For the price its a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the bag is falling off so the bag doesn’t stand without falling over. It’s hardly been used and when it was it was in a golf cart. Poorly made product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shemeld

customer_reviews.title: Bag has a lot to offer.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be very durable. No complaints thus far. The height is somewhat short, but otherwise very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Third Sacker

customer_reviews.title: Great value, lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Great value, lots of storage, and great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag - nice price. Got a lot for a little
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bag. Everything that the expensive bags have.
customer_reviews.author: Irivne CA Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost. So much pockets to pack ...
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the cost. So much pockets to pack all my gadgets, snacks and coins. If the bag came with notches on the top and bottom to keep my cart straps in place and a loop on the bottom for lifting, I would have given this 6 stars.
customer_reviews.author: New Tester

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, plenty of storage, looks good and full length dividers.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Newton

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive golf bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great golf bag for the price. Looks nice, looks of zippered compartments, and the full length dividers keep the clubs separated easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot-Z Golf Bag
customer_reviews.text: Many features with several zippered pockets and it is light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a cart bag, no stand.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so far! Great golf cart bag with all the slots you will need.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Louis Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Being disabled it is light weight and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Being disabled it is light weight and easy to get to pockets. Makes it much easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: LLTL

customer_reviews.title: Great cart Golf bag for the price...
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes, have had it over a year... still in great shape.. and have had others ask about it...
customer_reviews.author: TheBern

customer_reviews.title: Golf Bag
customer_reviews.text: My golf bag was a great add on to my golf game thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Leroux

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the bag!
customer_reviews.text: Receive the bag, and put it to use right away. Like it very much, light weight, good looking, and very functional. Dividers are great,and also a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bag worked great, kept my clubs separated in the individual dividers and enough zippered pockets for all needed items.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great bag with plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and functional golf bag.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Works well and lots of storage pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Hookedup1

customer_reviews.title: lots of storage space for equipment
customer_reviews.text: seems to be well made , looks good , have not had it long enough to know durability
customer_reviews.author: M. Nimmons

customer_reviews.title: light weight, functional
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine. The delivery was made to the wrong address on the other side of the street. It was brought to me by the person who lives there later that day.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good value!
customer_reviews.text: There is certain design features of the bag I did not pay attention to when purchasing that may have swayed my decision but overall it’s good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel C. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag more than some of the much more expensive ones I have owned
customer_reviews.author: gwillie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's good, it would be great if it had a handle in the front.
customer_reviews.author: grm

customer_reviews.title: Very good golf bag
customer_reviews.text: The golf club separators go all the way down to the bottom. It has all kinds of pockets and is light weight. Very nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag for price
customer_reviews.text: Very light, lot of pockets with dividers. Carry strap broke after two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great price-lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the bag. Separate openings for each club. Looks great !
customer_reviews.author: stephen Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Really like the 14 separated full length club partitions and the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rain cover does not fit.
customer_reviews.text: Bag looks great. The only problem so far, the rain cover does not fit. One of the snaps do not line up on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great and spacious golf bag
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room in cooler and plenty of space. Has everything you need. Great product for cost and value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag for the money, plenty of pockets. You could easily carry a change of clothes and all of your gear.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the bag. It has adequate space for clubs and a separate area for a putter with oversized grip. The bag represents a good value, and has enough pockets for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Colin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a great bag for the price. I haven't used it yet, but I'm very impressed. Plenty of storage, very light - a great upgrade from my previous stand bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

product_meta.title: Hot-Z Golf 4.5 Cart Bag
product_meta.description:
Hot-Z 4.5 Cart Bag is perfect for golfers looking for a larger bag that will hold everything they may require. This bag has a 9.5" top with 14 way "FULL LENGTH" dividers and offers eight zipper pockets, putter pit, bottle compartment, velour lined pocket, rain hood and about every other feature you could ask for. Golf bags are what Hot-Z does and when you compare all their features and benefits, you'll see why Hot-Z is the obvious choice.

Features:

9.5 inch 14-way graphite friendly separator top w/ putter pit and handles14 Full length club/shaft dividers8 zippered pockets including a velour lined valuables pocket & bottle compartmentPadded rear position single carry strap w/ elastic band to secure strapPen sleeve, towel ring w/ velcro glove attachment, umbrella and tee holder, scorecard sleeve & rain hood coverLight weight dobby nylon materials
feature_bullets: 9.5 Inch 14-way graphite friendly separator top w/ putter pit and handles
8 Zippered pockets including a velour lined valuables pocket & bottle compartment
Padded rear position single carry strap w/ elastic band to secure strap
Pen sleeve, towel ring w/ velcro glove attachment, umbrella and tee holder, scorecard sleeve & rain hood cover
